title: 25. An Overview of the Python African Computational Science and Engineering Tour Project
summary:
Godfrey Ejiroghene Akpojotor, Louis Ehwerhemuepha Pervading of computer
activities into the teaching/learning process and research make them
constitute a third pillar in science and engineering (S & E) in addition
to theory and experiment. Python African Computational S & E Tour is to
ease the learners into programming with Python and to use it for
modeling, simulation and visualization to aid teaching/learning process
and research in Africa.
